entries.journal_entry_description: You have been asked to get involved with an investigation into a number of break-ins at cybernetic labs on Rori.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Lieutenant Orden Tarc of the RSF is trying to find whoever it is that is breaking into some small cybernetic labs in the area. He wants you to investigate one of the labs and check for any clues that might help identify the perpetrator.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: On one of the lab data terminals, you find an attempt to log onto it with the name, Ponda Baba but there is no record of a Ponda Baba working at that lab.
entries.task01_message_box_text: On one of the lab data terminals, you find an attempt to log onto it with the name, Ponda Baba, but there is no record of a Ponda Baba working at that lab.
